content: the ljubljana district court made a decision in an inheritance case the deceased person had various assets including real estate and funds in a personal account the court identified the heirs the widow and daughter of the deceased and divided the assets equally between them the court used the inheritance act and the civil procedure act in making its decision the court received the death certificate and initiated succession proceedings the heirs must pay a court fee and will receive a certificate of final validity to take possession of movable property the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit necessary information and payment of a court fee the summary was provided on october 8 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, pension benefits
